item.title: Report X-2023090366
item.description:
Report X-2023090366

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: ANAHEIM
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The Package was found to be wet/stain on the outer container when loaded to the van. Package was place in a hazmat bag and tote and taken for inspection. Upon inspection we found 1 of the 4 glass bottles had cracked/broken causing to leak out. all clean up material was kept with package. DescribePack: The body of one of the 4 glass bottles had crack/broken causing to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was place in a hazmat bag and tote.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Tugger driver notified QA about a damaged hazmat at unload. Upon arrival, I placed in in a lined tote and quickly brought it to the hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: The bottle of Formula 83 had a loose cap DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Quickly placed in a lined tote and it was placed with the orientation arrows facing up.

  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of disinfectant (un1903) damaging 4 of the inner poly 1 quart bottles and releasing 4 quarts of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

Contractors were dispatched for the containment of the release.

  • City: WALLACE
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: HUNT & SONS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was headed east bound on state route 12 in the community of Wallace located in Calavaras County. It appears the driver drifted off to the right shoulder of the highway hit loose gravel then over corrected ultimately losing controlled. Truck rolled on drivers side trapping the operator. Appox. 1500 gals of diesel fuel spilled out onto the hwy and surrounding vegetation. There was no water contamination.

item.title: Report X-2023090320
item.description:
Report X-2023090320

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: CHINO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Manager noticed that hazmat pail was leaking all over the floor. Manager then placed absorbent sheets underneath the pail to help it to not spread. QA was notified about the leaking HazMat to come and collect it. Hazmat was placed into a white clear hazmat bag with absorbent sheets and then placed into a red hazmat tote. DescribePack: Bottom part of the plastic pail was punctured which led to the corrosive liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a clear hazmat bag with absorbent to help stop the liquid from coming out. Absorbent sheets were used to clean up the spilled liquid on the floor, and the hazmat bag was then placed inside the hazmat tote to get taken to the hazmat cage to get processed.

item.description:
Report E-2023090709

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

item.title: Report X-2023081955
item.description:
Report X-2023081955

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023081955 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME FROM UNLOAD RLTO TRAILER 560882 WET ON TOP AND LEAKING. DAMAGED IN TRANSIT. PACKAGE PACKED INTO TRAILER UPSIDE DOWN. DescribePack: THREE BOTTLES WITH SUCKED IN BODIES. CAPS, THOUGH TIGHT, SLOWLY LEAKED. HALF GALLON LOSS OF MATERIAL. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: SPILL NEUTRALIZED AND COLLECTED WITH PHNINE AND SMALL BROOM. PACKAGE PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG LINED DRUM. 2. X-2023081958 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME FROM UNLOAD RLTO TRAILER 560882 WET. DAMAGED IN TRANSIT INITIALLY FROM ANOTHER DAMAGED HAZMAT PACKAGE BUT ALSO HAS INTERNAL LEAKAGE FROM LOOSE CAP. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE LEAKED FROM CAP AN EIGHTH OF A TURN LOOSE. ONE TENTH OF A GALLON LOSS. SPILL ISOLATED TO PACKAGING. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG LINED DRUM.
